input_email_body:
Subject: Concern with Data Analytics Dashboard

Here is a brief description of the issue: **Problem:** The data analytics dashboard is malfunctioning. **Details:** It is showing incorrect investment forecasts My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. **Reason:** Potentially, this is because of an outdated Microsoft Dynamics 365 integration. **Steps Taken:** Restarted the system and checked the TP-Link switch connections. You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.
